name: Errant - A Prologue (WIP)
description:
WIP. Early prototype for Errant, a choices matter adventure/role-playing game inspired by Arthurian legends.

Known issues:

- there's no ending

-game doesn't reset when going back to menu

Coming soon:

-an ending

-quest journal

-equipment screen

-volume option

All feedback is welcome!

All non-original assets from Unity or  https://opengameart.org/
